localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Unai is both a VR headset and a virtual world designed specifically for it. The hardware and software are being built together to make spending time with people in VR feel the same as in real life.
blogPost.body: Unai is both a VR headset and a virtual world designed specifically for it. The hardware and software are being built together to make spending time with people in VR feel the same as in real life.
blogPost.title: Unai - A VR headset & world designed for real social interactions
blogPost.author: Naval Ravikant

localize.description: Unai既是一款VR头显，也是一个专门为它设计的虚拟世界。软硬件共同打造，让在VR中与人相处的感觉和现实生活中一样。
localize.tagline: 一款专为真实社交互动而设计的VR头显与世界。

localize.description: Unai既是一款VR頭顯，也是一個專門爲它設計的虛擬世界。軟硬件共同打造，讓在VR中與人相處的感覺和現實生活中一樣。
localize.tagline: 一款專爲真實社交互動而設計的VR頭顯與世界。

previous.excerpt: Stay organized and social with Gamelib ~ Store your games in libraries, log playthroughs to your diary, rate and review games, follow friends, create custom ranked/unranked lists, see upcoming and popular games, and more.
previous.title: Gamelib 2.0 - Keep track of, discover and socialize about games.

localize.description: 使用Gamelib保持组织和社交~将你的游戏存储在游戏库中，将游戏的玩法记录到你的日记中，对游戏进行评分和评论，关注朋友，创建自定义的排名/未排名列表，查看即将到来的和流行的游戏，等等。
使用Gamelib保持組織和社交~將你的遊戲存儲在遊戲庫中，將遊戲的玩法記錄到你的日記中，對遊戲進行評分和評論，關注朋友，創建自定義的排名/未排名列表，查看即將到來的和流行的遊戲，等等。
